power.thermoo-patches.cold_immune.name: Freezing Immunity
power.thermoo-patches.cold_immune.descri: You are immune to cold temperatures.
power.thermoo-patches.cold_vulnerability: You freeze much faster than humans.
power.thermoo-patches.extra_frost_resist: You are more resistant to cold temperatures.
power.thermoo-patches.extra_heat_resista: You are more resistant to high temperatures.
power.thermoo-patches.heat_immune.name: Heating Immunity
power.thermoo-patches.heat_immune.descri: You are immune to warm temperatures.
power.thermoo-patches.heat_vulnerability: You are warmed much faster than humans.
power.thermoo-patches.ignores_cold_effec: Cold has no negative effects on you.
power.thermoo-patches.ignores_heat_effec: Heat has no negative effects on you.
text.autoconfig.thermoo-patches.title: Thermoo Patches Config
text.autoconfig.thermoo-patches.option.a: Requires BOTH Armor Points++ and libhud
text.autoconfig.thermoo-patches.option.i: Freezing from eating icicles and Ice Sickles
